title: Something went wrong
subtitle: We encountered an error while processing your request.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.subtitle: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
notFound.description: It might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.

unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.subtitle: You don't have permission to access this resource.
unauthorized.description: Please sign in with an account that has the required permissions.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.subtitle: Something went wrong on our end.
serverError.description: We're working to fix this issue. Please try again in a few minutes.

networkError.title: Connection Error
networkError.subtitle: Unable to connect to our servers.
networkError.description: Please check your internet connection and try again.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least {{min}} characters
validation.invalidFileSize: File size must be between {{min}} and {{max}}
